org.dkpro.core.io.solr

Class SolrWriter_ImplBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.uima.analysis_component.AnalysisComponent_ImplBase
      • org.apache.uima.analysis_component.Annotator_ImplBase
        • org.apache.uima.analysis_component.JCasAnnotator_ImplBase
          • org.apache.uima.fit.component.JCasConsumer_ImplBase
            • org.dkpro.core.io.solr.SolrWriter_ImplBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.uima.analysis_component.AnalysisComponent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SolrWriter

    public abstract class SolrWriter_ImplBase
extends org.apache.uima.fit.component.JCasConsumer_ImplBase
    This class implements a basic SolrWriter. Specific writers should define a subclass that overwrites the generateSolrDocument() method to take custom fields into account.

    The class initializes a SolrServer instance, and calls generateSolrDocument() for each incoming CAS, and adds the result to the Solr server. A commit is executed when all documents are processed.

      • PARAM_WAIT_SEARCHER

        public static final String PARAM_WAIT_SEARCHER
        When committing to the index, i.e. when all documents are processed, block until a new searcher is opened and registered as the main query searcher, making the changes visible?
